casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar Taylor. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 7, 2006. Daniel Shatz, Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Taylor. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of September 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Serve Proposed Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of October 2006 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of September 2006."
